channel.title: Octopress on JimmyLiao

item.title: Re-Setup Octopress on different laptop
item.description: You will learn how to create blog post on different laptop.

item.title: How to add Category list into your octopress
item.description: Following Eddie’s blog entry. Thank you, Eddie! :-) Steps: Download the categories rb file into octopress plugins directory Modify your _config.yml rake generate; rake deploy Reference: http://blog.eddie.com.tw/2011/12/05/add-catetories-to-sidebar-in-octopress/
